author: Brian S
content:
Sorry about your troubles Andreas. I will be interested in hearing how your going to handle backing-up your blog in the future. I'm assuming your going to work something out now ðŸ™‚. For my own sites I've been doing a simple ftp download every couple of days but I'm not sure that's the best way. 
Great photos as usual. The bent wheel must be a statement right? ðŸ™‚
